name: books_myconfig_requestAccess
description: Request concurrent and download access restrictions.

cpksver.description: The device/version ID from which to request the restrictions.

source.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

volumeId.description: The volume to request concurrent/download restrictions for.

licenseTypes.description: The type of access license to request. If not specified, the default is BOTH.

locale.description: ISO-639-1, ISO-3166-1 codes for message localization, i.e. en_US.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$ul: **concurrentAccess**
**deviceAllowed**: Whether access is granted for this (user, device, volume).
**kind**: Resource type.
**maxConcurrentDevices**: The maximum number of concurrent access licenses for this volume.
**message**: Error/warning message.
**nonce**: Client nonce for verification. Download access and client-validation only.
**reasonCode**: Error/warning reason code.
**restricted**: Whether this volume has any concurrent access restrictions.
**signature**: Response signature.
**source**: Client app identifier for verification. Download access and client-validation only.
**timeWindowSeconds**: Time in seconds for license auto-expiration.
**volumeId**: Identifies the volume for which this entry applies.
**downloadAccess**
**deviceAllowed**: If restricted, whether access is granted for this (user, device, volume).
**downloadsAcquired**: If restricted, the number of content download licenses already acquired (including the requesting client, if licensed).
**justAcquired**: If deviceAllowed, whether access was just acquired with this request.
**kind**: Resource type.
**maxDownloadDevices**: If restricted, the maximum number of content download licenses for this volume.
**message**: Error/warning message.
**nonce**: Client nonce for verification. Download access and client-validation only.
**reasonCode**: Error/warning reason code. Additional codes may be added in the future. 0 OK 100 ACCESS_DENIED_PUBLISHER_LIMIT 101 ACCESS_DENIED_LIMIT 200 WARNING_USED_LAST_ACCESS
**restricted**: Whether this volume has any download access restrictions.
**signature**: Response signature.
**source**: Client app identifier for verification. Download access and client-validation only.
**volumeId**: Identifies the volume for which this entry applies.
**kind**: Resource type.
